thread.title: Lauren Conrad debuted her baby bump in the cutest little dress that just screams “Spring!”
thread.title_full: Lauren Conrad debuted her baby bump in the cutest little dress that just screams “Spring!”

author: Devan McGuinness
title: Lauren Conrad debuted her baby bump in the cutest little dress that just screams “Spring!”
text:
Lauren Conrad debuted her baby bump in the cutest little dress that just screams “Spring!” We love celebrating pregnancy and when one of our favorites, Lauren Conrad, announced she was expecting, we jumped for joy. She has always been someone we look to for fashion advice and Conrad debuted her baby bump in a dress that’s fit for an angel.
The former Hills star is expecting her first child with husband William Tell , and now that she’s far enough in her pregnancy to show, all eyes are on her maternity fashion choices and she is not disappointing.
The 31-year-old attended the pop-up shop before the fashion show for Rebecca Minkoff’s Spring 2017 line in Los Angeles wearing an adorable while lace dress.
Getty Images / Rachel Murray The Rebecca Minkoff Morongo Dress features an off-the-shoulder neckline and the hem hits just above the knee. The bell sleeves gives the look of a total goddess angel and of course, her growing bump can be seen even with the flowy fabric.
Getty Images / JB Lacroix She paired the dress with comfortable looking sandals, which is an even bigger plus when you’re pregnant. Conrad kept her hair and make-up in her signature style of classic and neutral with her blond hair parted in the center with muted lipstick and black liner.
Getty Images / JB Lacroix Seriously, she looks totally glam and comfortable, which isn’t easy to pull off when you’re regnant, but she nailed it.
